message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $11,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'd like to get closer to its value to you.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $9,000 is significantly below its true worth. I could consider letting it go for $10,500.  This is a very competitive offer considering the value you'll gain.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $10,250. Can you consider that?
